name: Rock Hudson Movies Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: One of Hudson's best known movies is "Giant". Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Edna Ferber.

	Liz Taylor played his wife. The movie is meant to be a "sprawling epic", but it doesn't quite make it.

Tobruk.

	Hudson stars in this action movie. "Anzio" starred Robert Mitchum. "Midway" featured an ensemble cast. "Wake" was an oldie with Brian Donlevy.

questions.text: Who did NOT co-star with Hudson in "Written on the Wind?
questions.explanation:
Richard Widmark.

	Good soap. Hudson is the strong silent type while Stack is a friend with problems. Malone and Bacall are the women in their lives: one is a woman of character - and one is not.

questions.text: Hudson starred as Taza, son of a famous Indian chief. Which one?
questions.explanation:
Cochise.

	The full movie title is "Taza, Son of Cochise".

questions.text: Hudson stars in "The Lawless Breed". The movie is about what legendary western figure?
questions.explanation:
John Wesley Hardin.

	They cleaned up Hardin's character a bit (of course), but it's supposed to be his "true" story.

questions.text: Hudson starred in "Ice Station Zebra". Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Alastair  Maclean.

	Maclean also wrote "Guns of Navarone". Here, Hudson and the Soviets clash at the top of the world. Jim Brown and Ernest Borgnine round out the cast.

questions.text: Hudson also starred in a John Wayne western. Which one?
Hudson starred in "Magnificent Obsession". Who was his co-star?
questions.explanation:
Jane Wyman.

	From the Lloyd C. Douglas novel. Playboy Hudson reforms and becomes a solid citizen. Not bad.

questions.text: Hudson often teamed with Doris Day; "Pillow Talk" may be the best of their movies together. In that movie, how did playboy Hudson try to charm women?
questions.correct: He composed a  song for them
options: He cooked gourmet meals for them
He told them that he would get them jobs as models
questions.explanation:
He composed a  song for them.

	Actually it was one tune - only the name of the woman changed.

questions.text: Which of these Doris Day comedies includes Hudson in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Send Me No Flowers.

	"Flowers" starred Hudson. The other co-stars were Rod Taylor ("Glass"), Cary Grant ("Mink") and James Garner ("Thrill").
